net.tinyos.prowler

Class Display

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • java.awt.Window
          • java.awt.Frame
            • net.tinyos.prowler.Display
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible

    public class Display
extends java.awt.Frame
    Inherited from java.awt.Frame this class controls the graphical output of our experiments. Basically it provides a white background on which we can draw network topology related graphs. See TestBroadcastApplication.
    Author:
    Gyorgy Balogh, Gabor Pap, Miklos Maroti
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
